overview.heading: Charlottesville Virtual Office
overview.body: Experience the luxury of a high-end business address in Charlottesville without the financial weight of maintaining an actual office. With Opus VO, you can establish your organization in one of our exclusive Charlottesville locations, all at a fraction of the cost of a traditional office lease. Access our cutting-edge meeting rooms for essential business engagements and client interactions, all while enhancing your brand through a prestigious Charlottesville address.  Opting for a virtual office in Charlottesville via Opus VO provides the unique benefit of a dedicated receptionist. Committed to delivering personalized, high-quality customer interactions, our team ensures that each client encounter is attuned to your specific business goals. Delegate administrative functions such as digital mail management and sophisticated call routing to us, allowing you to concentrate on advancing your enterprise.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Charlottesville, Virginia even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Charlottesville. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Virginia.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Charlottesville virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.
